games.title: Demon's Souls
games.description: An RPG set in the dark fantasy world of Boletaria. Unveil the mystery of the Souls!

games.title: Dark Souls
games.description: The dark ring has appeared and you must remove the curse! Go on a pilgrimage to Lordran where the kings are enshrined.

games.title: Dark Souls 2
games.description: Journey into the fictional kingdom of Drangleic where you might find the remedy to cure the curse of the undead. Start in Madula to collect souls and advance to dark dungeons to fight off challenging foes!

games.title: Bloodborne
games.description: Yharnam, a gothic city riddled with diseases, blood, and death. Patients are affected by a local disease causing them to transform into bestial creatures. Become a hunter and explore the vast world while fighting off horrific creatures!

games.title: Dark Souls 3
games.description: Dive into an apocalyptic dark fantasy world and tackle dungeons with tough monsters. Weapon arts have been added to allow you perform special attacks. Become more tactical!

games.title: Elden Ring
games.platforms: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox series X | S, Windows
games.description: Have you ever wondered what a game would be like from the mind of George RR Marten? Elden Ring is it! Explore the vast and mystical 'Lands Between' where you will find a world filled many dark secrets.
